steps: Enter the map [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs) and search for and kill five [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) whom can be found throughout the map. Be sure to check if they have the [MP-133 12ga pump-action shotguns](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MP-133_12ga_pump-action_shotgun). This shotgun can be found on Scavs, inside various [Searchable Containers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Looting#Searchable_Containers), or simply lying around.  They must be in a functional state to be handed in. To hand over the shotguns, go to the Traders menu, then to [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor) and click on the "Tasks" tab. Here you should see the "Turn In" button to hand over the shotguns.

Head into the map [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs). The [Machinery key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Machinery_key) is required to access the [Bronze pocket watch](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Bronze_pocket_watch_on_a_chain) so if you do not yet have it, head to room 205 located on the second floor of the three-story dorm building.

To enter the room you'll need to jump on top of debris blocking the hall and crouch to get inside the doorway of the room. The [Machinery key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Machinery_key) can be found within the [brown jacket](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Jacket) beside the dresser.

After obtaining this key, head south to the fuel tanker beside the construction site. The driver side door of the cab can be unlocked with the [Machinery key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Machinery_key).
Inside, the [Bronze pocket watch](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Bronze_pocket_watch_on_a_chain) is found sitting on the floor in front of the seat.

After picking up the pocket watch it will be placed in your quest items inventory. You must successfully extract with the pocket watch to hand it in. If you die before extraction, you will have to retrieve it again. Hand the pocket watch over to [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor) to complete the quest.

[Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods) is a wide and open map. To make this quest easier it's recommended that you use a long ranged weapon to take out [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs). An [OP-SKS](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/OP-SKS) with a scope or a [Mosin 7.62x54R bolt-action sniper rifle](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Mosin_7.62x54R_bolt-action_sniper_rifle) are fairly cheap ways to complete this quest. The lumber mill and Scav house, as well as the two villages by the river and the radio tower, will usually be populated with [Scavengers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavengers). These locations are where you will find most of your kills.
Below is a map with yellow circles indicating where to find scavs

images.caption: Docs 0022 is under the desk, on top of the drawers
The sheet metal break room where you have to place the documents

steps: To begin, you need to have the [Tarcone Director's office key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Tarcone_Director%27s_office_key). If you do not have one, you can find it within [drawers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Drawer) or from [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs). It can also be bartered for with [Therapist](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Therapist). Once you have obtained one, head to [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs). The first place you want visit the red Paradigm warehouse on the east side of the map. The office is found at the top of the metal stairs. After unlocking the door there will be two rooms. The second room is the one containing the documents. Be warned though, to enter this room the door must be breached, which will create a lot of noise. After entering the room, go to the desk and look just under the table top, on top of the drawers. Leaning may help you to see it. Extract from [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs). If you die at any point after picking up the documents and you still have them in your in raid quest inventory, they will be lost and must be reacquired. If you don't want to do the second part of the quest immediately, you can move the documents into your off-raid quest inventory in the character menu under the "tasks" tab.

It's time to head to [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory). You can complete this during the daytime or nighttime. With the documents in your in raid quest inventory, head towards the Gate 3 extraction. To the left of the extraction is a short metal staircase leading to a sheet metal room. This is where you must place the documents. To place them you, must hold down your use key (default `F`) for 10 seconds. For safety, you should lie down when placing them to be out of sight from the doorway and windows. If you die before the timer finishes, you need to retrieve the documents again. Hence, try to make sure nobody is around to disturb while you place the documents (i.e. either kill all other PMCs or wait until they have left the raid). After placing them you then must survive and extract. You do not have to survive and extract on the same raid that you planted the documents, it can be done in any [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory) raid.
Upon accepting the quest, the player will get 4x [MS2000 Marker](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker) through the messenger.
Note that what you have to mark are the orange fuel tanker trucks, not actual tanks.

The markers can be placed in any order over any number of raids. You do not need to place all four markers in the same raid. The markers can be used from your [Secure Container](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_containers), so it's a good idea to keep them there in the event that you die so that you do not need to purchase additional markers to complete the quest.After placing a marker, the player must stay alive for 30 seconds or they will have to place another marker on the tanker.

You do NOT need to be around the truck after the marker has been placed - only players can destroy the markers, and it is extremely rare for someone to look for them. Go and hide, as death will result in you losing the marker and having to buy a new one from [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor).
Fuel Tank №1 is at the new gas station.
Fuel Tank №2 is at the construction site (where you get the [Bronze pocket watch on a chain](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Bronze_pocket_watch_on_a_chain)).
Fuel Tank №3 is at the old gas station.
Fuel Tank №4 is on the road between the Crossroads and Trailer Park extractions.

images.caption: Locked room location marked on map (purple)
The jacket the key spawns below
The Portable cabin where the document is located
The door that needs to be unlocked

steps: The [Portable bunkhouse key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Portable_bunkhouse_key) is required for this quest. It has a dedicated spawn at the ground under a jacket in the locked room ([Factory emergency exit key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory_emergency_exit_key) required) next to the office on [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory). Due to it's low spawn chance, it's not the most reliable way to obtain this key.
It can also be found on [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs), in [Jackets](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Jacket) or just be bought from the flea market.

Once you have obtained the key head to [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs). The room you have to unlock is near the center of the map, south of the dorms in the construction zone. There will be 2 cabins stacked on top of each other with a staircase leading up to the second one. The documents can be found in the right room of this cabin on the table. In the left room is a [Weapon box (5x2)](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Weapon_box_(5x2)). Survive and extract from [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs) to complete the quest.

images.caption: ZB-014 bunker location marked on map

steps: For this task, you have to obtain 3 [AK-74 5.45x39 6L31 60-round magazines](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/AK-74_5.45x39_6L31_60-round_magazine) with [found in raid](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Found_in_raid) status.

images.caption: The wanted bunker, "1986" on the wall above
The letter is stuck inside the shirt collar

steps: See [Postman Pat - Part 2](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Postman_Pat_-_Part_2) for additional rewards related to this quest.

The messenger body is located in a bunker on the main floor of [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory). For orientation, the number "1986" can be seen painted above the bunker on the wall. The letter can be found tucked into the shirt collar  of the [Dead Scav](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dead_Scav) and has *not* to be searched in his loot container part.

The letter must be handed over to [Therapist](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Therapist) in [Postman Pat - Part 2](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Postman_Pat_-_Part_2) before this quest can be completed.
Postman Pat is reference to the hit British children's TV show Postman Pat.

[Dorm room 203 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dorm_room_203_key) is required for this quest. It has a chance to spawn in [Dorm room 214](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dorm_room_214_key) which is locked with the [Dorm room 214 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dorm_room_214_key) or it can be found in [drawers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Drawer).

After you have obtained [Dorm room 203 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dorm_room_203_key) head to the second floor of the three-story dorms on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs). Go into dorm room 203 and look under the bed. The quest item is a large metal suitcase. After obtaining the [Bank case](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Bank_case) head to your extraction and hand over the case to complete the quest.

Due to its size, [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory) is a good location to do this quest on, as well as using impact grenades like the [RGO](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/RGO). Breaking someones leg or waiting until they're lying down before throwing a grenade reduces your opponents chance to get away from your grenade. If your opponent is in a small room, throw a grenade inside and quickly close the door, locking them in with the explosion.

Because [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory) night raid time is set to 3:28:00, all PMC kills will be counted for the quest and there is no need to wait for the correct time range.

It's possible to use a compact reflex sight mounted on a [canted rail](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/NcSTAR_MPR45_Backup_mount) instead of the [Trijicon REAP-IR thermal scope](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Trijicon_REAP-IR_thermal_scope) to obtain the kills. The scope just needs to be installed to count towards the quest.

For this quest you have to kill 15 [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline) while using an [AKM](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/AKM), [AKMN](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/AKMN), [AKMS](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/AKMS) or [AKMSN](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/AKMSN). No other weapon that seems similar to the AKM will work.

Cannot be completed using a [Rotor 43 7.62x54R muzzle brake](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Rotor_43_7.62x54R_muzzle_brake), [Surefire SOCOM556-RC2 5.56x45 sound suppressor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Surefire_SOCOM556-RC2_5.56x45_sound_suppressor),  [KAC PRS/QDC 7.62x51 sound suppressor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/KAC_PRS/QDC_7.62x51_sound_suppressor), [SIG Sauer SRD762-QD 7.62x51 sound suppressor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/SIG_Sauer_SRD762-QD_7.62x51_sound_suppressor), [SR-25](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Knight%27s_Armament_Company_SR-25_7.62x51_marksman_rifle), [R11 RSASS](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Remington_R11_RSASS_7.62x51_marksman_rifle), [MP9](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MP9), [MP9-N](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MP9-N), [LOBAEV Arms DVL-10 Saboteur .308 bolt-action sniper rifle](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/LOBAEV_Arms_DVL-10_Saboteur_.308_bolt-action_sniper_rifle), [PL-15 9x19 sound suppressor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/PL-15_9x19_sound_suppressor), or [SilencerCo SAKER ASR 556 5.56x45 sound suppressor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/SilencerCo_SAKER_ASR_556_5.56x45_sound_suppressor).

Enter the map [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline) and search for and kill 12 [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) whom can be found throughout the map. Scavs can typically be found in the red marked areas during a raid:
Care should be taken when engaging Scavs at the extraction points as players may accidentally stumble on you and surprise you.

All variants of the [AKS-74U](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/AKS-74U) including the [AKS-74UB](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/AKS-74UB) and [AKS-74UN](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/AKS-74UN) can be be used for this quest.
Enter [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs) and kill 25 [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs). They can be found more commonly in the areas marked red below:
Because of the large amount of recoil, using the AKS-74U in full-auto at any distance besides point-blank is not recommended.
except [Twitch balaclava](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Twitch_Rivals_2021_balaclava)

Only [shotguns](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Weapons#Shotguns) using [12x70mm](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/12x70mm) can be used for the Scav kills in the Woods part of the quest.
The following areas have a reasonable chance to spawn [Salewa first aid kits](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Salewa_first_aid_kit):

images.caption: Pumping station with the 2 unlockable doors

steps: **•Both keys give you access to the pumping station, so only one of the two keys is required.**

[Gas analyzers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gas_analyzer) can also be [crafted](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gas_analyzer#Crafting) in the [Hideout](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Hideout).

While [gas analyzers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gas_analyzer) have a chance to spawn in the pumping station on [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory), as suggested by the Therapist, they are much more common to find on the map [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange). The OLI store as well as the smaller electronics stores will sometimes even yield you multiple [gas analyzers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gas_analyzer) in a single raid. Another way of acquiring gas analyzers are in jackets, toolboxes, cabinets, and stashes on any of the maps that have them.
The pumping station is located in the hall that leads to the standard extraction.

images.caption: Pumping station with the 2 unlockable doors

steps: **•Both keys give you access to the pumping station**

[Gas analyzers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gas_analyzer) can also be [crafted](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gas_analyzer#Crafting) in the [Hideout](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Hideout).
The pumping station is located in the hall that leads to the standard extraction. You need to get into it to complete the first objective.

While [gas analyzers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gas_analyzer) have a chance to spawn in the pumping station on [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory), as suggested by the Therapist, they are much more common to find on the map [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange). By searching the shelving of all the electronics stores, multiple [gas analyzers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gas_analyzer) can be found in a single raid.

One of the best places to find [morphine](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Morphine_injector) is at the Health Resort on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline) as it has a large amount of [Medbag SMU06](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Medbag_SMU06) and [Medcases](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Medcase). Another great spot for morphine is in the medical building on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs) on the 2nd floor of the building.

images.caption: 2-story dorms and key spawn location marked
The carbon case on the desk
Blue jacket in the trunk of the blue car at military checkpoint

steps: First off, you'll need a [Dorm room 114 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dorm_room_114_key). It can be found on [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) or just be bought on the flea-market, as well as having a chance to spawn in a specific jacket in the trunk of a car at the military checkpoint on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs).

After obtaining the key, go to the two-story dorms building. On the first floor, room 114 can be found. Upon unlocking the door, you'll find the [Carbon case](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Carbon_case) on the desk.

images.caption: The cabins inside the lumber yard
The Docs under the bed of cabin Nr. 3

steps: By completing [Kind of sabotage](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Kind_of_sabotage), you will lose access to this quest.
The documents are located at the lumber camp on [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods), under a bed in the Nr. 3 wooden cabin.

images.caption: The cabins inside the lumber yard
The Docs under the bed of cabin 3

steps: By completing [Supply plans](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Supply_plans), you will fail and lose access to this quest.
The documents are located at the lumber camp on [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods), under a bed in the wooden cabin Nr. 3.

images.caption: The location of a [Ration supply crate](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ration_supply_crate) next to a tank on [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve)

steps: [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange) is great place to go for this quest:

[Drawers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Drawer) commonly spawn spark plugs. [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve) is a great place to loot these filing cabinets, with several in the Knight buildings, Queen building, and underground office area.
The needed [MS2000 Markers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker) can be bought from [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor) LL1.
Two of the wanted Ambulances are located near the Tunnel exit. The third one is located at the health resort near the helicopter.

images.caption: The info is on the windowsill by the Chair

steps: The [Secure Folder 0060](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_Folder_0060) can be found on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline), in Room 306 of the West wing at the Resort, located on a windowsill.
The wanted minivan is located at the shore on the Eastern side of the lake on [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods). The blood sample needs to be taken from the right sliding door.

images.caption: The "breach" room where you plant the [Gunpowder "Kite"](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gunpowder_%22Kite%22)

steps: The required room is the "Breach Room" on Factory. Place 3x [Gunpowder "Kite"](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gunpowder_%22Kite%22) while **night time** there.The "Breach Room" is the room between the office and the locked room on the third floor. Each [Gunpowder "Kite"](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gunpowder_%22Kite%22) takes 30 seconds to place, leading to a total placement time of 90 seconds. Closing the door to the breach room is recommended while placing them, as Scavs will wander down the hallway periodically. If you wish to complete this quest with little to no resistance it is recommended to bring a squad to defend you as you plant the items.

Player must be wearing [Respirator](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Respirator), [GP-5 gasmask,](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/GP-5_gas_mask) or [GP-7 gas mask](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/GP-7_gas_mask) to achieve progress. These can be found being worn by [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav).

images.caption: Body and cabin marked on the map
Bush near the "Welcome to Tarkov" truck with the body where you find the Unknown key.
Cabin that is opened with the Unknown key.
The document is under the jacket

steps: A single copy of the [Unknown key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Unknown_key) is guaranteed to spawn on the hidden body each raid, regardless of whether or not a player in the raid has the quest The Extortionist active.
You must have both flash drives before you can hand them in to [Skier](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Skier). They cannot be handed in one at a time, unlike many other quests.

images.caption: The lighter on the table in room 303
The wanted cabin at the trailer park

steps: *This [quest item](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Quests#Quest_items) can only be found if the quest is active.**When picked up, this item is transferred to the player's quest item inventory.**If the player does not place the item and fails to extract with it, they will lose it.*
*The player may stash the lighter from their in-raid quest item special stash. (Can not be stashed from your hideout special stash)*

The [Gilded Zibbo lighter](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gilded_Zibbo_lighter) can be found on the desk in room 303 of the 3-story dorm on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs). You need a [Dorm room 303 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dorm_room_303_key) to access it.

After picking up the [Gilded Zibbo lighter](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gilded_Zibbo_lighter) it will be placed in your quest inventory (accessible through the **Tasks** tab). If you die while it's in your inventory, you will need to re-retrieve it.

Next, head to the cabin south of the large red Paradigm warehouse in a parking area. You'll need the [Trailer park portable cabin key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Trailer_park_portable_cabin_key) which you were given at the beginning of the quest.

After unlocking the cabin you'll be prompted to place the [Gilded Zibbo lighter](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Gilded_Zibbo_lighter). To place the lighter in the cabin, you must stay in it holding down your use key (default `F`) for 30 seconds.
If you release the key or are otherwise interrupted, the timer will reset. After placing the lighter the player does not need to extract, the quest is completed whether you die or not.

images.caption: Doc in the northeastern corner of the train car, between the pallet and the wall
Dorm room 220 Key spawns under the pants close to the Doc

steps: Accepting this quest will trigger the quest [Polikhim hobo](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Polikhim_hobo) from [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor).

*This [quest item](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Quests#Quest_items) can only be found if the quest is active.**When picked up, this item is transferred to the player's quest item inventory.**If the player fails to extract with this item, they will lose it.*

The [Docs 0013](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_Folder_0013) is located inside of a train car on the eastern "Boiler Tanks" section of the map.To retrieve [Docs 0013](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_Folder_0013), the player may have to lie down to access the prompt to pick up the documents. After grabbing the documents, the player must successfully extract from the map. If killed, they will lose the documents.

When this quest is active, the [Docs 0013](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_Folder_0013) can also be found in the room with the blue barrels in the Resort East Wing on Shoreline used for [Cargo X - Part 2](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Cargo_X_-_Part_2). It can also be retrieved from there and turned in.

images.caption: Location of the Train Car with Dorm room 220 key.
The train car from far away.
Close up view of the key, somewhat hidden under the pants.
On the shelving of dorm room 220
Plugged into the laptop in dorm room 220

steps: You'll need to have the [Dorm room 220 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dorm_room_220_key), which Skier provides when accepting this quest, to enter the room in the three-story dorms. The key itself can spawn under a pair of pants inside a train car, near the warehouses by Boiler spawn.

After entering dorm room 220 in the three-story dorms, look on the desk for a laptop. The [Sliderkey Secure Flash drive](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sliderkey_Secure_Flash_drive) should be plugged into the right side of the laptop. Note that the [Sliderkey Secure Flash drive](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sliderkey_Secure_Flash_drive) is unique to this quest and is a different item than the [Secure Flash drive](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_Flash_drive). The [Sealed letter](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sealed_letter_with_a_TG_logo) is located above the desk on the metal bookshelf. It's sticking out from between the row of binders by the left end of the bookshelf. After retrieving both items the player must successfully extract from the map.

images.caption: The "breach" room where you find the syringe

steps: The [syringe](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Syringe_with_a_chemical) is located in the Factory offices behind a door which must be breached. On the right side of the room is a filing cabinet; the syringe is tucked in the left side of a partially open drawer of that cabinet.

The vehicle where the beacon is placed.

steps: By completing either [Out of curiosity](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Out_of_curiosity) or [Big customer](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Big_customer), you will fail and lose access to this quest.

If you do not have one already, purchase a [MS2000 Marker](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker) from [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor).After placing the marker, the player must stay alive for 30 seconds or they will have to place another beacon in the van. You do not need to be near the van after the marker has been placed. Find a nearby hiding spot and wait until the timer is complete.

steps: Can be found in the ambulance near the gas station on Customs

The first container can be found in room 112 of the Resort west wing on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline). [Health Resort west wing office room 112 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Resort_west_wing_office_room_112_key) needed.

The second container can be found in the "EMERCOM medical unit" on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange). [EMERCOM medical unit key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/EMERCOM_medical_unit_key) needed.
The third container can be found in the "Mantis" store on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange) in a round tin in the back-middle of the store.
Medical bloodsets can be found in medical places (Emercom, Mantis, chemistry...) and medical containers
The [Dogtags](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dogtag) can be obtained by taking them off dead USEC PMCs (they do not have to be killed by your hand).

Simply give $6,000 to [Skier](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Skier). [Dollars](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dollars) can be acquired by selling items to [Peacekeeper](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Peacekeeper), purchasing them in exchange for [Roubles](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Roubles), or can be found as loot throughout Tarkov.

steps: **•Both keys give you access to the joint balcony, so only one of the two keys is required.**
The **first controller** can be found in the center console of a black SUV at the checkpoint west of the lumber camp.
The **first gyroscope** can be found in an open black box located in the back of a cyan pickup at the lumber camp.
The **second controller** can be found near the "Road to Customs" extraction. Start by finding the car trailer near the Radar Antenna. You should see it near the railroad tracks.
Jump onto the trailer and then look at the corner shown in the picture below, facing away from the radar station. You want to start from this corner and run directly straight ahead.
After a few seconds of running, you should bump right into the box that contains the Controller.

Another way is to start at the crashed drone near the "Road to Customs" extract. Stay right next to the rock nearby, facing the drone, turn a bit right and you can see the wooden box with the second controller in it.

The **third controller** is located in the health resort. Head to room 306 in the east wing of the resort. You either need a [Health Resort east wing room 306 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Resort_east_wing_room_306_key) or a [Health Resort east wing room 308 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Resort_east_wing_room_308_key) to gain access to the room. Once inside room 306, go to the balcony where the controller can be found inside of a cardboard box.

The **second gyroscope** is also located in the health resort. Head to room 216 in the west wing of the resort. You need a [Health Resort west wing room 216 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Resort_west_wing_room_216_key) to enter it. After entering the room, immediately turn left. There will be a metal cabinet with a slightly opened door in front of you. Look through this door and you'll be able to grab the gyroscope.

steps: Both items can be found in [The Lab](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/The_Lab) in the Main Working Area (O11). The processors are found on a pedestal inside a cage with an orange robotic arm and the transmitters on a desk behind it. They can also be crafted in the [Hideout](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Hideout) (Intelligence Center lv. 2).

The specified UN armor needs to be used while making the [Scav](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav) kills with an [M4A1](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/M4A1), You can mod the M4A1 and bring additional items to what is required. If you lose the initial set of gear, you can purchase all the specified gear from [Peacekeeper](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Peacekeeper).

steps: Placing each camera requires you to be stationary for 20 seconds, so be sure to secure the area first.
The first camera needs to be placed on top of a box in the "Brutal" Store on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange).

Killa is able to spawn inside and around the Brutal store, so caution is necessary. In addition to Killa, players frequently rush this area. It is recommended to wait 5-10 minutes before entering the area.
The second camera needs to be placed near the pier on a pile of wood in [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods).
The third camera needs to be placed in a bush near the sniper roadblock exit on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs).

steps: The "mattress next to the BTR-80A" is located on a bed in the "Generic" Store on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange).
The "microwave on the 3rd floor of dorms" is located in the "Kitchen" (Big room without door) in the 3 story dorms on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs).
The "middle accommodation unit of the sawmill" means the wooden cabin number 2 in the lumber yard on [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods).
From 06:00 is day break with full daylight being present from 08:00 for those less comfortable with night time raids.

This Quest can be done with any [shotgun](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Weapons#Shotguns) that uses [12x70mm ammunition](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/12x70mm). If kills don't count, reattach the silencer in raid.
It is recommended to do this task alongside [Setup](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Setup) as you will be hunting for PMC's anyways.

steps: *This [quest item](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Quests#Quest_items) can only be found if the quest is active.**When picked up, this item is transferred to the player's quest item inventory.**If the player does not plant the item and fails to extract with it, they will lose it.*

Before starting your trip to the 3-story dorms on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs), you need to acquire the [Flash drive with fake info](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Flash_drive_with_fake_info). It can be found in the trunk of a red burnt-out car on the main bridge that is located on the eastern side of the map. You can extract with the False flash drive and plant it in another raid.

For the duration of this quest you are only allowed to kill PMC's, not any Scavs (including bosses). With this in mind it's recommended that you bring a suppressed weapon to deal with PMC's so as not to attract Scavs and [Zarya stun grenades](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Zarya_stun_grenade) to deal with Scavs. Doing this quest in the night time also helps, as Scavs have a harder time detecting you. Be sure to put the [Roler Submariner gold wrist watch](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Roler_Submariner_gold_wrist_watch) in your [secure container](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_containers) so you don't lose it if you die. It also helps to bring a friend along to cover you while you plant the items as you will be exposed the entire time. Now that you're all ready it's time to head to the 3-story dorms and get up to the 3rd floor. In the middle of the 3rd floor, right across from the staircase is the trash pile where you need to plant the items. You do not need to plant all the items in the same raid and they can be planted in any order. Once all items are placed you have completed the quest, you do not need to survive after planting the items.

**Note**: Even after placing all the items killing any scavs during the raid will result in a failure. Do not kill any scavs until you have extracted from the raid and turned in the quest for completion.
**Note**: If you fail this quest, you must RESTART the quest by talking to Skier again. Don't end up in Dorms with an SV-98 and Roler with no prompt to stash them...

steps: Take these two items with you to [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline) and navigate to the small rowboat on the beach by the gas station in the south. Once there, go up to the rowboat and hold down your interact key. This will start a countdown of 30 seconds. Once the 30 seconds are up, one of the two items will be removed from your inventory. Repeat this again to place the second item. Once you have placed the second item and extracted, the quest is complete. Extraction does not need to occur in the same raid you place the items in.
MS2000 Markers can be purchased from Prapor.

steps: The objective of this quest is to plant a [MS2000 Marker](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker) at each of the four "marked" locations on the maps [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs), [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods), and [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline). These markings look identical to the one shown in the quest banner. These locations are known to have high-value and rare loot, so proceed with caution.

The first marked spot is located in the "Marked room" (dorm room 314) on the third floor of the 3-story dorms on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs). The [Dorm room 314 marked key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dorm_room_314_marked_key) is required to unlock the door. The room is at the end of the hall and easily identified by the lit candle and markings all over and around the door.
The second and third marked spots are located on [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods):

The fourth marked spot is located in the "pig room" (East Wing Room 321) on the third floor in the health resort on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline). Like on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs), the room is easily identified by candles and numerous markings on the door. Inside the room are multiple slaughtered pigs and a [Dead Scav](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dead_Scav) with a pig's head. The spot to plant the [MS2000 Marker](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker) surrounds the bathtub with the [Dead Scav](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dead_Scav).

steps: The [Key to the closed premises of the Health Resort](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Key_to_the_closed_premises_of_the_Health_Resort) has the be picked up on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline), laying on a chair in the bunker that is located north of the health resort. It only spawns while the quest is active. Once retrieved, you must extract and turn in the item to [Peacekeeper](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Peacekeeper). If you die after retrieving it and before turning it in, you will have to go and retrieve it again.

[Dollars](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dollars) can be purchased from [Peacekeeper](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Peacekeeper) with [Roubles](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Roubles).

The easiest way to complete this task is via utilizing a scav on interchange to loot OLI, as propane tanks and alkali are commonly found on the shelving in the area. To get the morphine and hoses, the crafts in the hideout for them are relatively cheap and easy (you may also find hoses in OLI).
**• Both keys give you access to East room 306, so only one of the two keys is required.**

[Health Resort east wing room 306 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Resort_east_wing_room_306_key) needed, alternatively [Health Resort east wing room 308 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Resort_east_wing_room_308_key) gives access to 306 via the balcony.

steps: The flash drive with the information can be found in the administration part (theatre wing) of the resort, on a table in an office on the eastern side on the top floor.
**•Both keys give you access to East room 328, so only one of the two keys is required.**

The Item can be found in Room 328 of the East wing at the Resort, located on a PC block. [Health Resort east wing room 328 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Resort_east_wing_room_328_key) or [Health Resort universal utility room key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Resort_universal_utility_room_key) needed.

You must survive a raid at each location consecutively without dying, disconnecting, or running out the timer. If you do any of these you will have to start again. If you extract from the raid with a "Run Through" status, you will not reset the quest, but that raid will not count as being completed. To avoid the "Run Through" status, gain at least 200 [EXP](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/EXP) in raid (by killing or looting) or be in raid for at least 7 minutes before extracting. You do not have to do the maps in order and can be done in any fashion so long as you survive.
**BUG**: You may not be notified when you've successfully found the antennas, so check your "Tasks" tab to see if the objective has been completed.

To complete this task, you must simply move into the vicinity of the following antennas:The first antenna is located on the roof of the resort west wing. There is a staircase on the north-western side of the west resort building that accesses the appropriate roof.The second antenna is located at the Weather Station. It is the antenna closest to the small 2-story building with the red and white radome on its roof.Finally, you must extract from [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline).These tasks can be done in multiple raids and dying will not affect your progress.
Commonly found inside of [Drawers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Drawer).
Commonly found in [PC blocks](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/PC_block).
Found within various electronics stores on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange), especially "TARKOVSTAR".
Unlocks [Signal Jammer](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Signal_Jammer) for purchase.

The first antenna is located at the radar station.The second antenna is located on the roof of the resort West wing.The third tower is located on a little hill near the road to customs extraction point. The [Signal Jammer](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Signal_Jammer) can be placed anywhere on the tower itself.After placing each [Signal Jammer](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Signal_Jammer) you must survive for 10 seconds. It is possible to place them divided through different raids, even without a successful exit. The objective to survive the raid can be achieved independently.
All 3 extraction points need to be visited by going close to their doors. A [Factory emergency exit key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory_emergency_exit_key) is not needed.

steps: This quest can be completed on both the day and night variants of [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory).

Get a hold of two [sets of tools](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Toolset) and head to [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory). You will need to plant each of the two tool sets at panels with blinking lights. There are three locations with blinking lights, but the two you are looking for are on the main floor, not in the tunnels. Each placement takes 20 seconds and the interaction key (default `F`) must be held down for the duration of the countdown, leaving you exposed. The first location is in the room of yellow forklifts. The second location is in the nearby hallway lined with many small windows in a grid pattern. After both items have been placed survive and exit the [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory) to complete the quest. If you die after repairing one of the two control panels, you do not need to repair them again, simply survive a raid on Factory to complete the "Survive and leave the area" objective and complete the quest.

To do this quest without risking the loss of your [sets of tools](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Toolset), only take one set of tools in your secure container and do two [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory) raids, placing one set each raid. This way if you are killed you will not lose them.
Found within [Drawers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Drawer), [Sport bags](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sport_bag), and on the shelving of electronics stores.
Commonly found in [Drawers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Drawer).
Commonly found in [PC blocks](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/PC_block).
The package is located within the second room (the door must be breached) of the Tarcone Directors office in the red Paradigm warehouse on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs).
Once you enter the room, look on the floor to your left. You must survive and extract with the package to complete the quest.
Both items can be found on [The Lab](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/The_Lab), one in O11 and the other in R21.

Wires and capacitors can most commonly be found in [PC blocks](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/PC_block), in tech stores on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange) such as TechLight, Texho, or Rasmussen, they can also be crafted in the hideout.

Buy and sell items at [Ragman](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ragman). Doing these two actions will build you towards his 750,000 rouble requirement to reach loyalty level 2. There are a few methods to reach this goal quickly. The quickest, but one of the most expensive, is to buy a large amount of one type of item from him, such as a [Kolpak-1S riot helmet](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Kolpak-1S_riot_helmet), and immediately sell them back to him. Repeat this until you're reached the required amount. Doing this will quickly deplete your cash though as you only make about half your money back when buying and selling an item. To obtain 750,000 worth of loyalty, you would lose about one third of the amount with this method.

Some of the items sold by [Ragman](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ragman) are also bought by [Skier](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Skier) at a higher price. Buying from [Ragman](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ragman) and selling to [Skier](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Skier) will help you retain more money than simply buying and selling to [Ragman](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ragman), but more items will need to be bought from [Ragman](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ragman) to complete the quest as both bought and sold items count towards Loyalty Level 2.

Walk into each of the stores listed in the quest objectives to complete the quest. This can be done over multiple raids if you're not able to do them at once. All of the required stores are on the first floor.
You can survive and leave the area in any raid after entering all the stores.

images.caption: One of the tankers to be marked

steps: Note that what you have to mark are the orange fuel tanker trucks, **not military tanks**. The tankers are located outside the mall.

The markers can be placed in any order over any number of runs. You do not need to place all three markers in the same run.After placing a marker, the player must stay alive for 30 seconds or they will have to place another beacon on the tanker.

As soon as you press the button to place the marker you can move away from the truck. While the timer is counting down you do NOT need to be near the marker - only players can destroy the markers, and it is extremely rare for someone to look for them. Go and hide, as death will result in you losing the marker and having to buy a new one from [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor).

After all three markers have been planted and their 30 second activation periods are complete you have completed three of the four tasks of this quest. The final task is to extract. This can be done during any [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange) PMC raid, not necessarily the one where you planted the [MS2000 Markers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker).
Can be found on [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) or on the heads on mannequins on the map [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange).

steps: If retrieving the manifests on different raids, make sure to turn them in before entering another raid, as death will empty your quest inventory.

Head to the small corridor north of Goshan (left, if entering the store from the front where the cash registers are). There, find the computer room, and look for the manifest on the desk.
Turn right after entering Oli via the main entrance. Go to the back of the store and look for a cube-shaped desk. The desk is marked by a sign over it, the manifest will be laying on the desk.
