steps: The [OLI logistics department office key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/OLI_logistics_department_office_key) can be obtained in a barter from [Jaeger LL3](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Jaeger).It can also be obtained as [a rare world spawn on Customs.](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/OLI_logistics_department_office_key#Key_Location)

images.caption: Barrels where the items need to be placed

steps: **DISCLAIMER**: Make sure that you have the [Shemagh (Green)](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shemagh_(Green)) and not the [Shemagh (Tan)](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shemagh_(Tan)).
Items do not need to be placed in order and can be placed over several runs.

Each item takes 20 seconds to place. Your use key must be held down to place each item. Take note that this will leave you very exposed. It's recommended you bring minimal gear and keep the items in your [secure container](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_containers).
*"Or as that hairy-chested spy, Austin or whatever, the dude in glasses"* is a reference to Austin Powers

Survive 7 raids on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange). Completing a raid with the "Run Through" status **will not** count towards this quests completion. To avoid this, gain at least 200 [EXP](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/EXP) in raid (by killing or looting) or be in raid for at least 7 minutes before extracting.

images.caption: Placement location for ComTac and Helmet

steps: The helmet and headset must be placed in a garbage pile in the "Avokado" store. The camouflaged variant of the 6B47 Helmet cannot be used.
The body armor must be placed outside the mall in a garbage pile next to the stage in front of the "ULTRA" store.
Note: The body armor and the helmet can be any durability.

[Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) can commonly be found at the front of OLI, Goshan, IDEA. Another spawn is in the main center hall of the mall, near the Kiba gun store. You can find more at power station, and also the road that runs parallel to the mall on the opposite side of the parking lot.
Two of them are located in the right garage (next to the main entrance of the Super), relatively close to each other.
The first one is to the left, at the locked-off down-ramp, and the second one is to the right, past the broken roof/floor, in the back corner.
The third one is in the fenced off in area next to Oli.
**Note:** Any items within will be lost upon being handed in!

The [Ski hat with holes for eyes](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ski_hat_with_holes_for_eyes) only spawns on [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs). The [Pilgrim tourist backpack](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Pilgrim_tourist_backpack) also only spawns on [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs), with the exception of very rarely spawning on the table in the old gas station on the map [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs).

**Note:** Backpacks will be handed in with everything inside causing those items to be lost. Be sure to empty the bag before handing it in. You can insure the one you want to hand in as it will show up as insured in the quest tab.
The first armor should be between 0% and 50% condition, which is 0 - 32.5 armor points. The second should be between 50% and 100%, which is 32.5 - 65 armor points.

If you are in a raid while wearing a [BNTI Gzhel-K armor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/BNTI_Gzhel-K_armor), you can have a group member shoot the armor to lower the durability on it if you do not have one below 50% of the max durability.
The first armor should be between 0% and 50% condtion, which is 0 - 42.5 armor points. The second should be between 50% and 100%, which is 42.5 - 85 armor points.
Since friendly fire is always active, you can complete the quest with the help of a friend.

**Note:** Chest rigs will be handed in with everything inside causing those items to be lost. Be sure to empty the rigs before handing them in. You can insure the ones you want to hand in as they will show up as insured in the quest tab.

[Charisma](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Charisma) is leveled by picking up items. To quickly level this skill place every item you find inside your inventory, even if you don't intend on keeping it. Because of the large number of items, going to [filing cabinets](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Drawer) and picking up everything inside them is a good way to gain [Charisma](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Charisma) experience. If you don't want the items, simply drop them and this will not slow down your experience gain.

images.caption: Barrel in the Goshan staging area in the shopping mall on Interchange
Generator next to the Goshan cash registers in the shopping mall on Interchange
Shelf in the "Techlight" store in the shopping mall on Interchange
Table on the scav island on Shoreline
Table in the roboter arm area in the Lab

steps: Below is the list of all the known spawn locations for [Fuel conditioner](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Fuel_conditioner):

The markers can be placed in any order over any number of runs. You do not need to place all three markers in the same run.After placing a marker, the player must stay alive for 30 seconds or they will have to place another beacon on the fuel stash .

You do NOT need to be near the marker after it has been placed - only players can destroy the markers, and it is extremely rare for someone to look for them. Go and hide, as death will result in you losing the marker and having to buy a new one.

If you extract from the raid with a "Run Through" status, the quest will not count as being completed. To avoid the "Run Through" status, gain at least 200 [EXP](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/EXP) in raid (by killing or looting) or be in raid for at least 7 minutes before extracting.

The statues/figurines can commonly be found in the furniture displays throughout the store IDEA on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange). Alternatively, they, along with the [Roler Submariner gold wrist watch](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Roler_Submariner_gold_wrist_watch) can be found in [Safes](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Safe). They can also be very rarely be found in other containers such as [Drawers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Drawer), [Sport bags](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sport_bag), [Dead Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dead_Scav), and more.

images.caption: Location of the hunting stand next to the plane

steps: Your task for this quest is to retrieve a message at [Jaegers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Jaeger) hunting stand and return it to [Mechanic](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Mechanic).

The message is a white paper below the hunting stand, partially hidden under a fallen makeshift wooden ladder. The hunting stand is located in the eastern half of the map, very close to the crashed plane.

Once you have retrieved the message, you must extract from the location and hand over it to [Mechanic](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Mechanic). This will unlock [Jaeger](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Jaeger) as a trader and quest giver.

The [Provisions](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Provisions) required for this quest have to be [found in raid](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Found_in_raid). These items can be commonly found in many maps such as [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve), [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange), and [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline).

Food can be most easily found in the kitchen wing of the black bishop building. In the locked caged rooms in the underground bunker are many loose food item spawns and [Ration supply crates](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ration_supply_crate). These crates spawn a large amount of food. The number of supply crates in each room is written in red on the map below, as well as the location of the kitchen being circled.
Lots of food items can be found scattered throughout the admin/theatre building at the resort.
There is a grocery store called Goshan (red on the map) packed with food. Check all the shelving to find it. A flashlight will be helpful for all the dark corners.
Packs can spawn at the USEC Camp frequently as well as the camp at the south-east of the lake.

This quest takes place on [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods), but before you go there you first need to get your PMC ready. When killing the [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) you can't be wearing any [armor vests](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Armor_vests) or [armored chest rigs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chest_rigs#Armored) ([helmets](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Headwear) are allowed). If you want to protect yourself during this quest you can choose to still wear armor, you will only need to remove it before killing a [Scav](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav). To keep yourself safe while doing this quest you should try and remain as far away as possible from the [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs). For the highest survivability you should equip a scoped weapon to get kills from afar.

images.caption: Location of the 2 bunkers on the map
Overview of the ZB-014 crate where to place the items
Overview of the ZB-016 crate where to place the items

steps: In both [ZB-014](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/ZB-014_key) and [ZB-016](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/ZB-016) on [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods), look for the broken crate in the first room and a "place" marker will come up. You have to place two seperate items per bunker. It takes 20 seconds to place each of the items. If you release the key or are otherwise interrupted, the timer will reset. Additionally, checking exits will interrupt your placement timer. After placing the items the player does not need to extract, the quest is completed whether you die or not.

A [Jar of DevilDog mayo](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Jar_of_DevilDog_mayo) gives you -99 hydration, [Can of condensed milk](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Can_of_condensed_milk) gives you -65 hydration. [Analgin painkillers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Analgin_painkillers) give you -19 per use. You can consume them quickly to go into a dehydration state. Using a [Propital regenerative stimulant injector](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Propital_regenerative_stimulant_injector) stimulant will heal you enough to last five minutes. Don't forget to bring some extra liquid to continue the raid.
Alternatively if you play with friends, you can ask them to shoot you in the stomach, you will then quickly dehydrate, you can patch your stomach when you are in the dehydrated state.

Doing a 'Run-Through' will **NOT** count towards the "Survive and extract" objective. But if that happens, you can survive and extract any raid, in any map, regardless of where and when you did the main objective.

This quest takes place on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline). Jaegers' photo album can be found in the resort, **West wing room 303** in the bottom drawer of the bedside table. The room is unlocked so no key is required.

To do this task, grab a [bolt-action rifle](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Weapons#Sniper_rifles) and do not attach any scopes or sights. Use only the iron sights. [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory) is not recommended for this quest as there are not many places where you can effectively engage at 40m or further. Only [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) count towards this quest, not PMCs. Woods, Shoreline, and Customs are good maps because of the sniper [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) that can be spotted from a far distance.
The end quote refers to [Vasily Zaitsev](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vasily_Zaitsev_(sniper)), a famous Soviet sniper during World War II.

For this quest only hits/kills on [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) or PMCs with a [bolt-action rifle](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Weapons#Sniper_rifles) count. You can hit the same target multiple times in the leg(s) and it will still count. For easier headshots on moving scavs, shoot them in the leg(s) first to slow them down.
Good spots to do the quest include:

To do this quest, grab any [bolt-action rifle](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Weapons#Sniper_rifles). [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory) is a recommended location for this quest, as there are ample opportunities to engage PMC's at 25m or closer.

You can use the [M7290 grenade](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Model_7290_Flash_Bang_grenade), the [Zarya grenade](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Zarya_stun_grenade) or a [KS-23M](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/KS-23M) with the ["Zvezda" flashbang round](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/23x75mm_%22Zvezda%22_flashbang_round) to flash and stun PMC'S and make them easier targets.

Keep in mind that to level up the [Sniper Rifles skill](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sniper_Rifles) you gain experience per hit, not just kill. With this in mind, you'll level this skill faster by shooting limbs instead of the chest or head as you can land more hits on your target to gain more exp before killing them.

Head to [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs) between 21:00 and 5:00. It's recommended that you go into the raid by at least 3:00 so you have time to advance the quest before 5:00. [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) can easily be frequently found at the crossroads, construction site, bus depot, and old gas station. Attaching a flashlight to your gun can be very helpful for hunting scavs in the darkness.[](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://static.wikia.nocookie.net/escapefromtarkov_gamepedia/images/b/b1/Customsscavnew.jpeg/revision/latest?cb=20210327194226)
Although they don't spawn 100% of the time, Sniper [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav) can currently be found in the following locations:

Generally, Customs is the best location to kill sniper scavs as it has the most. Killing them at night for this quest is recommended as you can quickly run down the main road through the map to see all of them under the cover of darkness. In order from left to right:

1. Construction Sniper. Spawns extremely frequently.2. Vacuum distillation tower. Spawns uncommonly.3. Warehouse Rooftop Sniper. Spawns about half the time.4. Checkpoint Sniper. Spawns about half the time.5. Sniper on rocks above Scav checkpoint. Spawns uncommonly.

1. Mountain Sniper. Spawns extremely frequently. Easily looted by jumping up the back side of the mountain.[](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://static.wikia.nocookie.net/escapefromtarkov_gamepedia/images/6/69/Sniper-Scavs-Woods.png/revision/latest?cb=20210212112125)

1. Northern Bunker Lookout Sniper. Spawns about half the time.2. Power Station Rooftop Sniper. Spawns extremely frequently.[](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://static.wikia.nocookie.net/escapefromtarkov_gamepedia/images/0/03/Sniper-Scavs-Shoreline.png/revision/latest?cb=20210212112338)

Maps with a large number of open spaces where you can effectively engage at 45 m or further such as [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods) and [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline) are recommended for this quest.

images.caption: Pier with the office building marked on map
Surgery kit on top of the wardrobe
The wanted villa marked on map
The wanted villa from the backside with back door

steps: In this quest you have to find Sanitar's [Surgery kit marked with a blue symbol](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Surgery_kit_marked_with_a_blue_symbol) and his [Marked Ophthalmoscope](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Marked_Ophthalmoscope) on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline).
The surgery kit can be found on the second floor of the office building at the pier, located on top of a wardrobe.

The ophthalmoscope can be found inside the locked villa in the western part of the map, near the swamp. You need a [Shoreline cottage back door key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline_cottage_back_door_key) to unlock the back door to enter the villa. The ophthalmoscope can be found in the left hand room on the second floor, inside a potted plant on the table.
By completing [The Huntsman Path - Sadist](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/The_Huntsman_Path_-_Sadist), you fail and will lose access to this quest.
You can raise your Vitality level by:

You can use a [eTG-change regenerative stimulant injector](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/ETG-change_regenerative_stimulant_injector) or a [Propital regenerative stimulant injector](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Propital_regenerative_stimulant_injector) and run through fire or obtain a heavy bleed to level up your vitality
The office area of the Factory is highlighted on this map.Only the enemy PMC has to be in the highlighted area for the kill to count towards this quest.

images.caption: Food storage cages marked inside the warehouse
Food storage cage with wooden crates inside

steps: **Reserve** is a [Quest](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Quests) in *[Escape from Tarkov](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Escape_from_Tarkov)*.

On [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve), enter the north-western located underground storage warehouse marked with "Д". After you headed down one of the ramps, you need to get next to the right side food storage cages, recognizable by the wooden crates inside. You don't need to survive and extract for this quest.
Kill 30 [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav) on any map.

You can use the [M7290 grenade](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Model_7290_Flash_Bang_grenade), the [Zarya grenade](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Zarya_stun_grenade) or a [KS-23M](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/KS-23M) with the ["Zvezda" flashbang round](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/23x75mm_%22Zvezda%22_flashbang_round) to cause the stun effect for this quest. [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory) is a recommended location for this quest, as there are ample opportunities to engage PMC's at close distance, thus reducing their chance to escape the stun effect.

For this quest you need to kill 5 PMC players at the dorms location on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs). The quest zone includes both dorm buildings and the guard house as well as the area between and slightly outside of them.

The golden TT must be functional, but does not need to contain all of its original parts, so you can swap the barrel and grips (these must also be [found in raid](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Found_in_raid)) out for cheaper alternatives before handing it in.
The guards wearing a police uniform are [Reshala](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reshala)'s bodyguards.

images.caption: Possible Killa locations marked on map

steps: Killa can spawn in the IDEA, OLI, GOSHAN stores as well as the center area around KIBA on the first and second floor. He can also be encountered in the parking area below IDEA and OLI.

Find and kill 6 [Scav Raiders](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav_Raiders) on [The Lab](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/The_Lab) or [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve). [Scav Bosses](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav_Bosses) and their guards do not count.

It's possible to use a compact reflex sight mounted on rail ([Burris AR-P.E.P.R. 30mm ring mount](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Burris_AR-P.E.P.R._30mm_ring_mount) or [JP Enterprises 30mm ring scope mount](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/JP_Enterprises_30mm_ring_scope_mount)) instead of the [March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP optical scope](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/March_Tactical_3-24x42_FFP_optical_scope) to obtain the kills. The scope just needs to be installed to count towards the quest.

images.caption: Room 206 in the two story dorms

steps: [Dorm room 206 key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dorm_room_206_key) can commonly be found in Scav pockets and [Backpacks](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Backpacks), as well as a barter with Therapist LL1 (for 7 [meds](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Pile_of_meds)). Once you have obtained the key head to the second floor of the two-story dorms on [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs). After unlocking the door you simply need to walk inside of the room to complete the objective but to finish the quest you must successfully extract from Customs once.

Enter the map [Customs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Customs) and search for and kill fifteen [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) whom can be found throughout the map but the most concentrated source is the construction site, the dorms and at the old gas station.
This quest is obtained when accepting the quest [Chemical - Part 1](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chemical_-_Part_1).

This task is removed from Prapor if it is not accepted before completing [Chemical - Part 1](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chemical_-_Part_1). That results in the following task [Regulated materials](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Regulated_materials) not showing as well.

The items required for this quest need to be [found in raid](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Found_in_raid). The only maps with them are Lighthouse and Reserve. but there is a small chance for a scav to have it in their backpack. The [6-STEN-140-M military battery](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/6-STEN-140-M_military_battery) is a large 4x2 slot item that resembles a black/brown box. It can most commonly be found sitting on or near tanks. The [OFZ 30x160mm shells](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/OFZ_30x160mm_shell) can be found throughout the [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve) on tables, shelving and at the rear side of every tank on the map, on the ground. Both of the items required for this quest can also be obtained from the [Scav Case](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Hideout#Scav_Case) in the [Hideout](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Hideout).A reliably good source for OFZ Shells is the [RB-BK marked key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/RB-BK_marked_key) room. A reliably good source for the Tank Battery are the [RB-ST](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/RB-ST_key) and the [RB-GN](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/RB-GN_key) rooms.

Complete this quest once your sniper skill is at level 6 to reach the requirement for [Wet Job - Part 6](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Wet_Job_-_Part_6) and [Psycho Sniper](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Psycho_Sniper) at the same time.
All cigarettes can commonly be found inside of:

images.caption: The wanted stores marked on map
The store that contains the first book, arrow marks the pile of books
The store that contains the second book, arrow marks the right shelf

steps: The first book is located in a store called "МУЗЕЙ ИСТОРИИ" ("Museum of History") on the second floor of the shopping mall on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange). It can be found in a pile of books.

The second book is located in the book store on the first floor of the shopping mall on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange). It can be found on the middle shelf in the lowest row that contains books.

images.caption: The wanted bunker, "1986" on the wall above
The letter is stuck inside the shirt collar

steps: The messenger body is located in a bunker on the main floor of [Factory](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Factory). For orientation, the number "1986" can be seen painted above the bunker on the wall. The letter can be found tucked into the shirt collar  of the [Dead Scav](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Dead_Scav) and has *not* to be searched in his loot container part.
The letter must be handed over to [Therapist](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Therapist) in Postman Pat - Part 2 before this quest can be completed.

images.caption: The warehouse with the vehicle inside.
The vehicle where the beacon is placed.

steps: This quest is activated after accepting [Chemical - Part 4](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chemical_-_Part_4).By completing either [Chemical - Part 4](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chemical_-_Part_4) or [Big customer](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Big_customer), you will fail and lose access to this quest.

You can buy the [MS2000 Marker](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker) from [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor).After placing the marker, the player must stay alive for 30 seconds or they will have to place another beacon in the van. You do not need to be near the van after the marker has been placed. Find a nearby hiding spot and wait until the timer is complete.

images.caption: The warehouse with the vehicle inside.
The vehicle where the beacon is placed.

steps: This quest is activated after accepting [Chemical - Part 4](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chemical_-_Part_4).By completing either [Chemical - Part 4](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chemical_-_Part_4) or [Out of curiosity](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Out_of_curiosity), you will fail and lose access to this quest.

You can buy the [MS2000 Marker](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker) from [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor).After placing the marker, the player must stay alive for 30 seconds or they will have to place another beacon in the van. You do not need to be near the van after the marker has been placed. Find a nearby hiding spot and wait until the timer is complete.

images.caption: Pieces of fabric locations on Interchange

steps: Depending on the faction of the player there will be a different dialogue and reward.

[Aramid fiber fabric](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Aramid_fiber_fabric) can commonly be found in clothing stores on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange). [Ripstop fabric](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ripstop_fabric) can be found in the same locations, though more rarely. They can also be found inside of [Sport bags](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sport_bag), [Buried barrel caches](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Buried_barrel_cache), and [Ground caches](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ground_cache).[Paracord](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Paracord) can be found in [Sport bags](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sport_bag). They can also be found spawning on the map [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve). For more specific spawn locations visit the [Paracord](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Paracord) page.

images.caption: Pieces of fabric locations on Interchange

steps: Depending on the faction of the player there will be a different dialogue and reward.

The [Cordura polyamide fabric](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Cordura_polyamide_fabric) and [Fleece fabric](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Fleece_fabric) can commonly be found in clothing stores on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange). They can also be found inside of [Sport bags](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sport_bag), [Buried barrel caches](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Buried_barrel_cache), and [Ground caches](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ground_cache).[KEKTAPE duct tape](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/KEKTAPE_duct_tape) can be found anywhere construction supplies spawns, drawers, and inside of [toolboxes](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Toolbox).

images.caption: In front of the office building at the pier
Next to the ambulance near the front of the resort

steps: Mark the three medical trading posts on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline) with the [MS2000 Markers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker). They can be found in the following locations:

The markers can be placed in any order over any number of raids. You do not need to place all three markers in the same raid. The markers can be used from your [Secure Container](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_containers), so it's a good idea to keep them there in the event that you die so that you do not need to purchase additional markers to complete the quest.After placing a marker, the player must stay alive for 30 seconds or they will have to place another marker on the trading post.

You do NOT need to be around the trading post after the marker has been placed - only players can destroy the markers, and it is extremely rare for someone to look for them. Go and hide, as death will result in you losing the marker and having to buy a new one from [Prapor](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Prapor).

images.caption: In the backyard of the locked villa
On the outside corner of the offices at the pier
Under the tail of the helicopter in front of the resort

steps: Locate the three bodies of the people [Therapist](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Therapist) hired on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline). These corpses will be covered with white shrouds. All three corpses must be found in a single raid. If you leave the raid and have only found some of the corpses, the quest will reset. You must extract in the same raid in which you found all the corpses. The three corpses can be found in the following locations:

images.caption: Bench back of locked villa house

steps: Mark the three medical containers on [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline) with the [MS2000 Markers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MS2000_Marker). They can be found in the following locations:

The markers can be placed in any order over any number of raids. You do not need to place all three markers in the same raid. The markers can be used from your [Secure Container](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_containers), so it's a good idea to keep them there in the event that you die so that you do not need to purchase additional markers to complete the quest.Unlike most quests that require the MS2000 markers, this quest has you "hide" the items like [Fishing Gear](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Fishing_Gear) or [Delivery from the past](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Delivery_from_the_past) do.Once you are in front of a container, hold down your interact key. This will start a countdown of 15 seconds. Once the timer is up, the marker will be removed from your inventory and the subtask will be completed.

The [Health Resort office key with a blue tape](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Health_Resort_office_key_with_a_blue_tape) can commonly be found on [Sanitar](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sanitar) and sometimes in [Jackets](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Jacket) or [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs). Once you have obtained the key head to health resort east wing first floor, room 110.
Simply walking into the room will satisfy the first objective. The requirement to extract from Shoreline can be satisfied before or after you find the room, as long as you have the quest active.

The fastest way to acquire all these stimulants is using the [Keycard with a blue marking](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Keycard_with_a_blue_marking) in [The Lab](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/The_Lab). Alternatively, you could kill [Sanitar](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sanitar), although he is not guaranteed to have them.

images.caption: Flash drive plugged into the laptop

steps: The [Flash drive marked with blue tape](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Flash_drive_marked_with_blue_tape) can be found in Sanitar's room in [The Lab](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/The_Lab). The room is located on the second floor, directly across from the [laboratory block (G22)](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/TerraGroup_Labs_keycard_(Green)) and requires a [Keycard with a blue marking](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Keycard_with_a_blue_marking) to enter.

In Sanitar's room, the [Flash drive marked with blue tape](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Flash_drive_marked_with_blue_tape) is stuck into the laptop that is located on the left desk after you enter.

images.caption: Control room marked on underground map

steps: The control room is located in the middle of the [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve) underground bunker system. You can reach it by using any staircase of your choice.

For this quest you have to locate and visit hermetic doors in the underground bunker system on [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve). For the subtasks 2, 3 and 4 you only need to find one of each which leaves 5 in total.

images.caption: The view approaching the USEC encampment from the North. Stay to the left when climbing the hill until you can see tree stumps. Do not enter the area with the tree stumps, as this is where the mines are
A view from within the minefield itself. If you can see either of these corpses, take extreme caution as you are likely already within the minefield itself.
The view approaching the USEC encampment from the North-West. Attempting to take this route will result in certain death, as there are landmines littered throughout the area.
Signs indicating the presence of a minefield beyond the sign itself.

steps: Quest steps do not need to be completed in succession - It is possible to discover each location in separate raids, however after discovering the 2nd objective extraction is necessary, otherwise progress is reset to only the 1st objective being completed.The two objective locations are next to each other in the Northwest corner of the map - The convoy is on the road just South of the radio tower, and the USEC camp is directly West of the convoy in the middle of a rocky area away from any roads.Be careful upon approaching the USEC encampment as land mines cover the western and north-western approaches to the location. The mines themselves are not visible and respawn after each detonation, so it is not possible to clear a path through them. The location of the mine fields are indicated only by sign posts along the exterior of the map, and not the approach along the north-west.

images.caption: Possible Killa locations marked on map

steps: Killa can spawn in the IDEA, OLI, GOSHAN stores as well as the center area around KIBA on the first and second floor. He can also be encountered in the parking area below IDEA and OLI.

It is recommended to avoid being spotted by Killa. He has multiple grenades and is generally accurate with his bursts. If you are close to him he will continuously push the player and relentlessly hunt them until he ambushes and assaults them. It is best to attack him with high-penetration ammunition such as [5.45 BS](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/5.45x39mm_BS_gs), [5.56 M995](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/5.56x45mm_M995), or [7.62x51](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/7.62x51mm_NATO). Without proper ammunition to kill him, shredding his [6B13 M](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/6B13_M_assault_armor_(Tan)) to low durability or firing solely at his legs are both appropriate, albeit more risky, strategies. Grenades generally won't work to kill him, as he is a highly mobile fighter and will rarely be pinned down long enough for a grenade to stop him. If fighting him with a teammate, attacking him from two different directions and peeking cover is a sound strategy, as he will continue to suppress one of his opponents while the other can safely return fire.

It is extremely important to utilize cover and stay mobile when fighting him, and to always be mindful of one's ammo count—if he's armed with his [RPK-16](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/RPK-16_5.45x39_light_machine_gun), he will likely outgun the player with his [95-round drum mag](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/RPK-16_5.45x39_95-round_drum_magazine) and supplementary [AK-74 5.45x39 6L31 60-round magazine](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/AK-74_5.45x39_6L31_60-round_magazine).

To gain access to this quest, most but not all quests in the game need to be completed. There is no clear pattern in which quests are required, since it's decided by the developers and changes with new game updates.
For keeping track of which quests are required, we have added the parameter "Required for Kappa container" in the infoboxes of quest pages.

If your experience deviates from our data, please let us know on the [talk page](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Talk:Collector) or on our [Discord](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://discord.com/invite/7ZeEyfU).
Until April 19, 2019 this quest was called "A049 C026 0101PD". There was a riddle hidden in the the dialogue and reward text.

=EjNyQzY2MzMjZjM3kjNyIjY2YjM -  - 2==AdpBiZvBCd19GImxWZzJXdvlHIlRXY09mcgwCbsV2dgMXYgIXZi1WduBiblRHI09mcgMXag4WZlRncphGd - 1rebmun eslaf si neetriht taht si hturt dnoces ,6 dna 4 fo mus eht eesuoy esab eht ta ,si hturt tsriF

Solving the riddle starts with the quest description, the first paragraph of the hex encoded text equating to `At interchange we were at bash zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba pryz1uts8q5onmlkj3hgfe4c2a` and the second one to `6t th1 1na of 8t 6ll, 2ou must 58ll th1 58ll6 and UrAgCe DEroRRiM`. The first uncovered paragraph indicates the existence of Atbash ciphered text, the text `zyxwvutsrqponmlkjihgfedcba pryz1uts8q5onmlkj3hgfe4c2a` equating to `abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz kiba1fgh8j5lmnopq3stuv4x2z`, a clear substitution pattern. Using the aforementioned substitution pattern, we can take the second paragraph found in the quest description and translate it to `6t the end of it 6ll, you must kill the kill6`, a clue which will become useful later along with the `UrAgCe` and `DEroRRiM` texts.

The first operation to be applied to the quest reward text seems obvious, either from the `DEroRRiM` (`MiRRorED` if mirrored) text or from the nature of the text, it being a simple mirror of the whole text block. After a mirror, the paragraph `First truth is, at the base you see the sum of 4 and 6, second truth is that thirteen is false number` is revealed, making us understand that the number 13 should be eliminated in all further findings and that the base being used for them will be 64, instead of the human-used 10. Thus, after removing the already used text, removing the number 13 and decoding the text from Base64, we can observe the following text: `thirteen is rot ten number as well, rotate yourself out of it` which indicates the use of the rot13 cipher. After another removal of our used text and a rot13 decryption we can observe the following lines: `Affine brought you two of the first numbers` coupled with `vjg pwodgt qh uycp ykvjjqnfu hkxg` and `how many steps should emperor of rome walk, one or three` coupled with `bgufs efbmjoh xjui txbot, zpv xjmm gjoe zpvstfmg jo b trvbsf pg gpvs / wkhuh lv d vshfldo sodfh wr uhyhdo brxuvhoi lq d vkdsh ri wxeh, wkh vkruw zdb wx.eh` which indicate the Affine and  Caesar ciphers respectively. After decyphering the Affine encoded text with the values `a = 1; b = 2` we obtain `the number of swan withholds five` and after decoding the Caesar encoded texts with a shift of 1 and 3 respectively we obtain after dealing with `swans, you will find yourself in a square of four / there is a special place to reveal yourself in a shape of tube, the short way tu.be`, both clues helping later.

To continue, we'll start with the remainder of our quest reward text: `266b2269726c336c4261` a hex encoded string which we should not decrypt for now. The clue `the number of swan withholds five` shows that 2 (a number which looks similar to a swan) should be replaced by the number 5, doing so in our hex text and then finally decoding it, indicated by the `square of four` clue, giving us `VkUiul3lEa`. Looking closely at the obtained string, we can observe the existence of the word `killa` within it, the clue `6t the end of it 6ll, you must kill the kill6` telling us to remove it from the text. Doing so will finally reveal the text `VUu3E` which if attached to the `UrAgCe` string obtained earlier, and being added onto a YouTube short link, as indicated by `there is a special place to reveal yourself in a shape of tube, the short way tu.be` revealing a [YouTube video](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UrAgCeVUu3E).

Approximately a week after finding the first YouTube video, a [Pastebin link](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://pastebin.com/F9xx5TAs) surfaced in the video description. For ease in describing the decryption progress, we'll split the document in 4 sections, one for each paragraph and will start with the last one since it exposes the 1st step within the process.

The paragraph is Base64 encoded, but before decoding it, all characters that are found surrounded by a `+` character need to be deleted and the contents need to be set aside to form the string `524f543437` which equates to `ROT47` in hexadecimal. After the removal of the odd characters, the text `File119111====T10p2 ...Be advised, we've  got... (transmission interrupted)====end of file` is revealed. We can note down the "file number" as the rest is just flavor text.

Using the former ROT47 clue we can solve this paragraph, applying a ROT47 decryption after a Base64 decode yielding the content we need, but slightly malformed. To clear this malformation every 22nd character in the original string needs to be removed (all of the characters being a 0), thus revealing `File108070107==== T10p1 Overseer, this is team 8 unit 13 Foreman callsign. We got ambushed, requesting backup.... ====end of file`. Like the last paragraph, we can ignore all text besides the file number.

After a reverse of this paragraph we can observe the string `m1560red})>/|:\<({4lphab3t` (originally `t3bahpl4{(<\:|/>)}der0651m`) is an outlier and will serve as a clue later, so we can remove it. The rest of the paragraph (still reversed) can simply be Base64 decoded to find `File086078121==== OVRp2 ...Possible locals ambush. ====end of file`. As with the former paragraphs, keep the file number and ignore the rest.

As with the former paragraphs we start with a simple Base64 decode. We can now take the `m1560red})>/|:\<({4lphab3t` clue and use it as a substitute alphabet while ignoring the importat numbers, giving us the `File082056117==== OVRp1 team 10, recon detail, moving to polikhim 1-12. backup call from team 8, unknown detail.... ====end of file` string, which again, can be disregarded besides the file number.

Concatenating all file numbers together yields `082056117086078121108070107119111`. If we group the characters and get their coresponding ASCII character, we obtain `R8uVNylFkwo` which leads to the final [YouTube video](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R8uVNylFkwo). The video has a few game keys in its description.The key are all activated and not available anymore.
The second found video is reused into an official short movie called "[Raid](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.comhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UPnrY5BxddI)".

This quest can be completed on any map. You can use a flashlight on your weapon to make this quest easier to complete. Interchange would be a great choice for this quest as inside the mall is almost the same at night and in day. Factory night is also good because it's always 3AM and servers are almost always empty.
[Shturman](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shturman) can be found on the map [Woods](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Woods) in the central area of the wood mill.

One of the most common areas that Shturman often hides, is near a pile of wood that is between the two largest warehouses, most of his hiding spots are visible from the big rock overlooking the area. It can be very easy to kill him from this position.
You can often hear Shturman rapidly fire his SVD at times early in the raid to quickly identify if he has spawned.

[M67 Hand grenades](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/M67_Hand_grenade) can be bought from [Peacekeeper](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Peacekeeper) LL2 after completing his task [Spa Tour - Part 2](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Spa_Tour_-_Part_2). Alternatively they can be bartered from [Peacekeeper](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Peacekeeper) LL2 for 2 [Zibbo lighter](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Zibbo_lighter) per grenade.

This quest is activated after completing [Chemical - Part 4](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chemical_-_Part_4) or [Out of curiosity](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Out_of_curiosity). By completing [Big customer](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Big_customer), you will lose access to this quest.

This quest is activated after completing [Chemical - Part 4](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chemical_-_Part_4) or [Big customer](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Big_customer). By completing [Out of curiosity](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Out_of_curiosity), you will lose access to this quest.

[Roubles](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Roubles) can be acquired by selling items to all [traders](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Trading#Traders) besides [Peacekeeper](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Peacekeeper). They can also be found as loot throughout Tarkov.

This quest is activated after completing [Out of curiosity](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Out_of_curiosity) or [Big customer](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Big_customer). By completing [Chemical - Part 4](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Chemical_-_Part_4), you will lose access to this quest.

images.caption: White Bishop building location on map (Green framed keys)

steps: This quest takes place on [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve). The two locations of the journals are inside of the medical building, White Bishop. The first of these journals is behind the locked room, [RB-KSM key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/RB-KSM_key) on the second floor. When you enter the room it's located on the right side, between 2 bookshelves. The second journal is also on the second floor, behind a door that can be unlocked with the [RB-SMP key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/RB-SMP_key). It's located on the left side of the room on the bottom shelf of the shelving unit.

images.caption: First and second group of tankers

steps: Place markers on the Gas tanks near the train station and under the dome.

images.caption: Close up of the item inside the crate

steps: In this quest you need to pick up and extract with a [MBT Integrated Navigation System](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/MBT_Integrated_Navigation_System). It can be found inside a locked off room in the bigger of the two garage buildings at the repair center (white knight) on [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve). A [RB-ST key](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/RB-ST_key) is required to open the door.
The item can be found inside a wooden crate in the back left of the room.

images.caption: D-2 extract and power lever marked on map
Close up of D-2 extract tunnel system

steps: This quest requires you to extract with the D-2 extract on [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve).

Activate the lever in the underground bunker below King/Airspace Control Center. Be aware, [Scav Raiders](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav_Raiders) have a chance to spawn in the underground upon activation. At the D-2 Extract, press the button on the wall. You need to exit the raid with survived status to get the quest complete. Run through status will not complete the quest.

Second BMP-2, in White Knight building (marker required)
Third BMP-2, in the locked RB-ST room (marker required)
Fourth BMP-2, below Dome near the Checkpoint Fence scav extract (marker required)
First LAV III, above Hermetic door extract bunkers (marker required)

Location of the T90M Commander control panel package

steps: The wanted package is located behind the dismantled rusty pipe in the underground workshop that you have to pass through to reach the D2 extraction.Once you have retrieved the package, you must extract from the location and hand it over to [Peacekeeper](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Peacekeeper).

images.caption: Quest area marked on underground map

steps: You are required to kill 5 [Scav Raiders](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav_Raiders) on [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve) inside the command area of the underground tunnel system. [Scav Raiders](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav_Raiders) have the chance to spawn there at the start of a raid, and additional ones may appear after the "D-2" extraction switch has been activated.

In this quest you have to find and extract three military documents. They are all located in the command part of the underground bunker system on [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve).
One is located on a desk in the glassed-in command room that is accessible from the room that has the D-2 power lever.
One is located in the room that is connected to the glassed-in command room in the bottom part of a shelf in the corner of the room.
One is located in a wardrobe that can be found in the large central hallway.

On [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve), enter the north-western located underground storage warehouse marked with "Д". After you headed down one of the ramps, you need to kill 10 [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs). Since you won't find 10 [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) in one try there, you need to return over multiple raids.

It's best to try and do this quest with a friend, as doing this quest solo is quite difficult. If Tagilla is chasing a teammate, try and shoot him in the nape, as it is not protected. The boss cap doesn't spawn 100% of the time, so it might take you a couple tries.
Must kill scavs within the barracks or outside in close proximity to the buildings (White Pawn and Black Pawn)
Note: Scav kills in the open, in Black Bishop, or near the helicopter will not count

See the [Cultists](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Cultists) page for their spawn locations. The Priest and some of the Sektants can carry the [Cultist knife](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Cultist_knife).
There are multiple ways to get the items needed.

[LEDX Skin Transilluminator](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/LEDX_Skin_Transilluminator) can be found on [The Lab](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/The_Lab) in the center area and within the locked rooms you can open with [TerraGroup Labs keycard (Blue)](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/TerraGroup_Labs_keycard_(Blue)) and [TerraGroup Labs keycard (Green)](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/TerraGroup_Labs_keycard_(Green)).On [Shoreline](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Shoreline) they can spawn in the [Resort](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/LEDX_Skin_Transilluminator#Location) and on [Sanitars](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Sanitar) body after killing him.On [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Interchange) they also have multiple [spawn locations](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/LEDX_Skin_Transilluminator#Location), especially in the [ULTRA medical](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/ULTRA_medical_storage_key) store. There is also the option to [craft](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/LEDX_Skin_Transilluminator#Crafting) them

The [Portable defibrillator](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Portable_defibrillator) can be found on [the Lab](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Portable_defibrillator#Location) and on [Interchange](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Portable_defibrillator#Location).[Crafting](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Portable_defibrillator#Crafting) is also possible.

For [Ophthalmoscope](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Ophthalmoscope) and [Pile of meds](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Pile_of_meds) you don't need to look for specific locations since they spawn everywhere where you can find medical items. You can also [craft](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Pile_of_meds#Crafting) the [Pile of meds](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Pile_of_meds).

You must survive a raid at each location consecutively without dying, disconnecting, or running out the timer. If you do any of these you will have to start again. If you extract from the raid with a "Run Through" status, you will not reset the quest, but that raid will not count as being completed. To avoid the "Run Through" status, gain at least 200 [EXP](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/EXP) in raid (by killing or looting) or be in raid for at least 7 minutes before extracting. You do not have to do the maps in order and can be done in any fashion so long as you survive.

[Scav Raiders](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scav_Raiders) have the chance to spawn inside the command area of the underground tunnel system at the start of a raid, and additional ones may appear there after the "D-2" extraction switch has been activated. Another way to make them spawn near the train yard to to activate the "Bunker hermetic door" extraction. There is also a chance that some spawn around the time the train arrives.
Any of the 3 levels of the mall will count, so long as the kill takes place within the exterior walls.
In this quest you have to kill all bosses in one "life". Meaning, you have to kill them all and extract successfully with survived status each time to complete the quest.

images.caption: Crane where the [Trijicon REAP-IR](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Trijicon_REAP-IR_thermal_scope) needs to be placed
Containers where the [Trijicon REAP-IR](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Trijicon_REAP-IR_thermal_scope) needs to be placed

steps: It is recommended to do this quest in multiple runs as the [Trijicon REAP-IR thermal scope](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Trijicon_REAP-IR_thermal_scope) cannot be put in [secure containers](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Secure_containers).It is also recommended to use the scope to clear the area as [Reshala](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reshala) can be encountered at both locations.The player may place the scope while it is still attached to a weapon, the character will then remove the scope from the weapon as soon as the item has been placed. Bringing a backup scope is recommended in this scenario.

All items can be found on [The Lab](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/The_Lab) and, apart from the [UHF RFID Reader](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/UHF_RFID_Reader), also on [Reserve](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Reserve) and [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).
For this quest you have to kill 15 [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) along the main road on [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).

images.caption: Documents between the file holders on the lower right of the shelf
Documents in the file organizer on the desk

steps: The wanted documents are located in two different buildings on the water treatment plant area in the north of the [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse) location.
In both buildings you need to get into the respective left hand upstairs office.
The "Blue Ice" is likely a reference to metamphetamine cooked by Walter White, in the AMC TV series Breaking Bad.

images.caption: First room on the left when you use the little bridge
The briefcase is located underneath the bed on the window side

steps: The briefcase is located under a bed on the second floor of one of the western houses that is directly located at the shore.
The helicopter is located in one of the basins at the water treatment plant in the north.

For this quest you have to kill 20 [Rogues](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Rogues) and [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) in the area of the water treatment plant on [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).

images.caption: The cargo next to the gray container

steps: The wanted cargo is a wooden crate that is located next to a gray shipping container on the western shore of [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).

images.caption: Closeup of the hideout with the message

steps: The wanted message is located below the door to [Jaeger's](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Jaeger) friends' hideout that can be found in the village on the eastern island. You need to extract with the message to complete the quest.

images.caption: View on the road, military truck on the left

steps: Locate the road leading to the currently closed lighthouse on [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse). You need to move **at least** in front of the military truck to get the quest completion.

images.caption: The Documents are located in a black files folder on a desk to the right after you enter

steps: The crashed helicopter is located on a hill in the south-southeast of [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).
The documents can be found on the first floor of the chalet that is located on the hill in the south-east of [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).
For this quest you have to kill 10 [Rogues](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Rogues) on [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).

images.caption: One BRDM is located in the west of the water treatment plant, under a tent
One BRDM is located in the north of the water treatment plant, under a tent
One Stryker is located in the south on the road to the lighthouse
One Stryker is located on the uphill street that leads to one of the chalets

steps: For this quest you have to find and mark four armored vehicles on [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).

images.caption: The corpses of the lost group

steps: The lost group is located on a tennis court that is part of the chalet on the hill in the south-east of [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).

images.caption: The tanks are located in the northeast of the northern freight yard
The first truck is located in the east of the northern freight yard, next to the rails
The second truck is located at the eastern wall of the water treatment plant
The third truck is located next to the southern entrance of the water treatment plant

steps: For this quest you have to find and mark a group of fuel tanks and three tanker trucks on [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).
For this quest you have to kill 12 [Scavs](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Scavs) around and between the cottages on [Lighthouse](https://escapefromtarkov.fandom.com/wiki/Lighthouse).
